emails.subject: Project Phoenix Initial Prototype
emails.body: Team, I am pleased to share that the initial prototype is complete. Attached is a zip with the build. Let me know if there are any issues running the demo.

emails.subject: Re: Project Phoenix Initial Prototype
emails.body: Thanks Dave. I ran the demo and noticed some performance lags on the data import feature. I'll profile the code and share results by tomorrow.

emails.subject: Re: Project Phoenix Initial Prototype
emails.body: Great work. I've started writing unit tests and will focus on optimizing queries. Expect updates by end of week.
